item.name: Archivelog
item.params: SELECT ROUND(6*A.LOGS*B.AVG) AS ARCHIVE FROM (SELECT COUNT (*) LOGS FROM V$LOG_HISTORY WHERE FIRST_TIME >= (sysdate -10/60/24) ) A, (SELECT AVG(BYTES) AVG FROM v$log ) B
item.description:
Archivelog rate per hour
(sysdate -10/60/24) = last 10 minutes
6*A.LOGS*B.AVG = 6 slices of 10 minutes to get the hour rate

item.name: Audit
item.params: SELECT LISTAGG(auditSession, ';') WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY dummy) AS auditSession FROM (SELECT 'dummy' AS dummy, ' Username: ' ||username || ', Timestamp: ' ||TO_CHAR(TIMESTAMP,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') || ', Statement: ' ||action_name || ', OS Username: ' ||os_username || ', User Host: ' ||userhost || ', Return Code: ' ||DECODE(returncode,'1004','-Wrong Connection','1005','-NULL Password','1017','-Wrong Password','1045','-Insufficient Priviledge','0','-Login Accepted','--') AS auditSession FROM sys.dba_audit_session WHERE (sysdate - TIMESTAMP)*24 < 1 AND returncode <> 0 ORDER BY TIMESTAMP ) GROUP BY dummy UNION SELECT 'none' FROM dual

item.name: DB Block Gets
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(name,'db block gets', value,0)) "block_gets" FROM v$sysstat

item.name: DB Consistent Gets
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(name,'consistent gets', value,0)) "consistent_gets" FROM v$sysstat

item.name: DB Hit Ratio
item.params: SELECT ROUND((( SUM(DECODE(name,'consistent gets', value,0)) + SUM(DECODE(name,'db block gets', value,0)) - SUM(DECODE(name,'physical reads', value,0))) / (SUM(DECODE(name,'consistent gets', value,0)) + SUM(DECODE(name,'db block gets', value,0)) ) * 100),2) "hit_ratio" FROM v$sysstat

item.name: DB Physical Reads
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(name,'physical reads', value,0)) "phys_reads" FROM v$sysstat

item.name: DB Version
item.params: SELECT LISTAGG(DBVERSION, ',') WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY DBVERSION) AS DBVERSION FROM (SELECT 'dummy' AS dummy, 'COMP_NAME = ' || COMP_ID ||' ' ||COMP_NAME ||' ' ||VERSION ||' ' ||STATUS AS "DBVERSION" FROM dba_registry UNION SELECT 'dummy' AS dummy, 'SERVERNAME = ' ||UTL_INADDR.get_host_name ||',SERVERADDRESS = ' ||UTL_INADDR.get_host_address AS "DBVERSION" FROM dual UNION SELECT 'dummy' AS dummy, 'DB_NAME = ' ||SYS_CONTEXT ('USERENV', 'DB_NAME') ||',INSTANCE_NAME = ' ||SYS_CONTEXT ('USERENV', 'INSTANCE_NAME') AS "DBVERSION" FROM dual ) GROUP BY dummy

item.name: Hit ratio - BODY
item.params: SELECT ROUND(gethitratio*100,2) "get_pct" FROM v$librarycache WHERE namespace ='BODY'

item.name: Hit ratio - SQLAREA
item.params: SELECT ROUND(gethitratio*100,2) "get_pct" FROM v$librarycache WHERE namespace ='SQL AREA'

item.name: Hit ratio - TABLE/PROCEDURE
item.params: SELECT ROUND(gethitratio*100,2) "get_pct" FROM v$librarycache WHERE namespace = 'TABLE/PROCEDURE'

item.name: Hit ratio - TRIGGER
item.params: SELECT ROUND(gethitratio*100,2) "get_pct" FROM v$librarycache WHERE namespace ='TRIGGER'

item.name: LI/O Block Change
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(NAME,'db block changes',VALUE,0)) BLK_CHANGES FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE NAME ='db block changes'

item.name: LI/O Consinstent Read
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(name,'consistent gets',value,0)) CONS_GETS FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE NAME ='consistent gets'

item.name: LI/O Current Read
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(name,'db block gets',value,0)) BLK_GETS FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE NAME ='db block gets'

item.name: Locks
item.params: SELECT LISTAGG(locks, ',') WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY dummy) AS locks FROM (SELECT 'dummy' AS dummy, ' ' || sn.USERNAME ||'@' ||sn.machine ||'|SID->' ||m.SID ||'|Serial->' ||sn.SERIAL# ||'|Lock Type->' ||m.TYPE ||DECODE(LMODE, 1, 'Null', 2, 'Row-S (SS)', 3, 'Row-X (SX)', 4, 'Share', 5, 'S/Row-X (SSX)', 6, 'Exclusive') ||DECODE(REQUEST, 0, 'None', 1, 'Null', 2, 'Row-S (SS)', 3, 'Row-X (SX)', 4, 'Share', 5, 'S/Row-X (SSX)', 6, 'Exclusive') ||'|Time (Sec)->' ||m.CTIME ||'|ID1->' ||m.ID1 ||'|ID2->' ||m.ID2 ||'|SQL Text->' ||t.SQL_TEXT AS locks FROM v$session sn, v$lock m , v$sqltext t WHERE t.ADDRESS =sn.SQL_ADDRESS AND t.HASH_VALUE =sn.SQL_HASH_VALUE AND ((sn.SID =m.SID AND m.REQUEST !=0) OR (sn.SID =m.SID AND m.REQUEST =0 AND LMODE !=4 AND (ID1, ID2) IN (SELECT s.ID1, s.ID2 FROM v$lock S WHERE REQUEST !=0 AND s.ctime > 5 AND s.ID1 =m.ID1 AND s.ID2 =m.ID2 ))) ) GROUP BY dummy UNION SELECT 'none' FROM dual

item.name: Max Processes
item.params: SELECT value "maxprocs" FROM v$parameter WHERE name ='processes'

item.name: Max Sessions
item.params: SELECT value "maxsess" FROM v$parameter WHERE name ='sessions'

item.name: Miss Latch
item.params: SELECT SUM(misses) FROM V$LATCH

item.name: PGA
item.params: SELECT value FROM V$PGASTAT WHERE name IN 'total PGA inuse'
item.description: A PGA is a memory region that contains data and control information for a server process. It is nonshared memory created by Oracle Database when a server process is started. Access to the PGA is exclusive to the server process. There is one PGA for each server process. Background processes also allocate their own PGAs. The total memory used by all individual PGAs is known as the total instance PGA memory, and the collection of individual PGAs is referred to as the total instance PGA, or just instance PGA. You use database initialization parameters to set the size of the instance PGA, not individual PGAs.

item.name: PGA Aggregate target
item.params: SELECT value FROM V$PGASTAT WHERE name IN 'aggregate PGA target parameter'

item.name: PHI/O Datafile Reads
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(name,'physical reads direct',value,0)) PHY_READ_DIRECT FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE name ='physical reads direct'

item.name: PHI/O Datafile Writes
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(name,'physical writes direct',value,0)) PHY_WRITE_DIRECT FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE name ='physical writes direct'

item.name: PHI/O Redo Writes
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(name,'redo writes',value,0)) REDO_WRITE FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE name ='redo writes'

item.name: Pin hit ratio - BODY
item.params: SELECT ROUND(pins/(pins+reloads)*100,2) "pin_hit ratio" FROM v$librarycache WHERE namespace ='BODY'

item.name: Pin hit ratio - SQLAREA
item.params: SELECT ROUND(pins/(pins+reloads)*100,2) "pin_hit ratio" FROM v$librarycache WHERE namespace ='SQL AREA'

item.name: Pin hit ratio - TABLE-PROCEDURE
item.params: SELECT ROUND(pins/(pins+reloads)*100,2) "pin_hit ratio" FROM v$librarycache WHERE namespace ='TABLE/PROCEDURE'

item.name: Pin hit ratio - TRIGGER
item.params: SELECT ROUND(pins/(pins+reloads)*100,2) "pin_hit ratio" FROM v$librarycache WHERE namespace ='TRIGGER'

item.name: Pool dict cache
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,'shared pool',DECODE(name,'dictionary cache',bytes,0),0)) pool_dict_cache FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Pool free mem
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,'shared pool',DECODE(name,'free memory',bytes,0),0)) pool_free_mem FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Pool lib cache
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,'shared pool',DECODE(name,'library cache',bytes,0),0)) pool_lib_cache FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Pool misc
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,'shared pool',DECODE(name,'library cache',0,'dictionary cache',0,'free memory',0,'sql area', 0,bytes),0)) pool_misc FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Pool sql area
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,'shared pool',DECODE(name,'sql area',bytes,0),0)) pool_sql_area FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Processes
item.params: SELECT COUNT(*) "procnum" FROM v$process

item.name: Sessions
item.params: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM v$session

item.name: Session Active
item.params: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM v$session WHERE TYPE!='BACKGROUND' AND status='ACTIVE'

item.name: Session Inactive
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(Type, 'BACKGROUND', 0, DECODE(Status, 'ACTIVE', 0, 1))) FROM V$SESSION

item.name: Session System
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(Type, 'BACKGROUND', 1, 0)) system_sessions FROM V$SESSION

item.name: SGA buffer cache
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,NULL,DECODE(name,'db_block_buffers',(bytes),'buffer_cache',bytes,0),0)) sga_bufcache FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA fixed
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,NULL,DECODE(name,'fixed_sga',bytes,0),0)) sga_fixed FROM V$SGASTAT
item.description: The SGA is a group of shared memory structures, known as SGA components, that contain data and control information for one Oracle Database instance. The SGA is shared by all server and background processes. Examples of data stored in the SGA include cached data blocks and shared SQL areas.

item.name: SGA java pool
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,'java pool',bytes,0)) sga_jpool FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA large pool
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,'large pool',bytes,0)) sga_lpool FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA log buffer
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,NULL,DECODE(name,'log_buffer',bytes,0),0)) sga_lbuffer FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA shared pool
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(pool,'shared pool',DECODE(name,'library cache',0,'dictionary cache',0,'free memory',0,'sql area',0,bytes),0)) pool_misc FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SQL Query Not Indexed
item.params: SELECT ROUND((SUM(DECODE(NAME, 'table scans (long tables)', VALUE, 0))/ (SUM(DECODE(NAME, 'table scans (long tables)', VALUE, 0))+SUM(DECODE(NAME, 'table scans (short tables)', VALUE, 0)))*100),3) SQL_NOT_INDEXED FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE 1 =1 AND ( NAME IN ('table scans (long tables)','table scans (short tables)') )

item.name: Uptime
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR((sysdate-startup_time)*86400, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue FROM v$instance

item.name: Users Connected
item.params: SELECT COUNT(username) FROM v$session WHERE username IS NOT NULL

item.name: Users Locked
item.params: SELECT LISTAGG(users_locked, ',') WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY dummy) AS users_locked FROM (SELECT 'dummy' AS dummy, ' username: ' ||username ||', lock_date: ' || lock_date ||', account_status: ' || account_status AS users_locked FROM dba_users WHERE ACCOUNT_STATUS LIKE 'EXPIRED(GRACE)' OR ACCOUNT_STATUS LIKE 'LOCKED(TIMED)' ) GROUP BY dummy UNION SELECT 'none' FROM dual

item.name: Waits Controlfile I/O
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'control file sequential read', total_waits, 'control file single write', total_waits, 'control file parallel write',total_waits,0)) ControlFileIO FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client','pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits direct path read
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'direct path read',total_waits,0)) DirectPathRead FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from ', 'SQL*Net more data from client','pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits File I/O
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'file identify',total_waits, 'file open',total_waits,0)) FileIO FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits latch
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'control file sequential read', total_waits, 'control file single write', total_waits, 'control file parallel write',total_waits,0)) ControlFileIO FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits Logwrite
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'log file single write',total_waits, 'log file parallel write',total_waits,0)) LogWrite FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits multiblock read
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'db file scattered read',total_waits,0)) MultiBlockRead FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits others
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'control file sequential read',0,'control file single write',0,'control file parallel write',0,'db file sequential read',0,'db file scattered read',0,'direct path read',0,'file identify',0,'file open',0,'SQL*Net message to client',0,'SQL*Net message to dblink',0, 'SQL*Net more data to client',0,'SQL*Net more data to dblink',0, 'SQL*Net break/reset to client',0,'SQL*Net break/reset to dblink',0, 'log file single write',0,'log file parallel write',0,total_waits)) Other FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits single block read
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'db file sequential read',total_waits,0)) SingleBlockRead FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits SQLNet
item.params: SELECT SUM(DECODE(event,'SQL*Net message to client',total_waits,'SQL*Net message to dblink',total_waits,'SQL*Net more data to client',total_waits,'SQL*Net more data to dblink',total_waits,'SQL*Net break/reset to client',total_waits,'SQL*Net break/reset to dblink',total_waits,0)) SQLNET FROM V$system_event WHERE 1 =1 AND event NOT IN ( 'SQL*Net message from client','SQL*Net more data from client','pmon timer','rdbms ipc message','rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

discovery_rule.name: Tablespace Discovery
discovery_rule.params: SELECT tablespace_name AS TSNAME, block_size AS BSIZE FROM dba_tablespaces;

item_prototype.name: Tablespace Size {#TSNAME}
Tablespace Usage {#TSNAME}
Tablespace Percent Used {#TSNAME}

trigger_prototype.name: [{HOST.NAME}] Tablespace Usage is more than 90% on {#TSNAME}

trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] "total PGA inuse" is more than 90% of PGA_AGGREGATE_TARGET
[{HOST.NAME}] Active process are using more than 80% of the available Process number
[{HOST.NAME}] Active Sessions are using more than 80% of the available Sessions

trigger.expression: {Template Oracle ODBC:db.odbc.select[ora_hitratio_table_proc, {$ORACLE_ODBC_DSN}].avg(60)}<50 or {Template Oracle ODBC:db.odbc.select[ora_hitratio_trigger, {$ORACLE_ODBC_DSN}].avg(60)}<50 or {Template Oracle ODBC:db.odbc.select[ora_hitratio_sqlarea, {$ORACLE_ODBC_DSN}].avg(60)}<50 or {Template Oracle ODBC:db.odbc.select[ora_hitratio_body, {$ORACLE_ODBC_DSN}].avg(60)}<50
trigger.name: [{HOST.NAME}] Hit Ratio less than 50%
